EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultant Services Email 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Randall,
Congratulations that is wonderful! I would be happy to speak with you today. Is there a good time for me to reach out? I am in the office all day if you want to give me a ring as well.
Very excited for you! Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Randall Thacker [mailto:randst27@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, February 10, 2012 12:58 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Randall Thacker
Hi Sara,
It looks like I've won my first contract! Would you have time to talk Friday (2/10) to set things up?
Randall
From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> To: randst27@yahoo.com Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2012 3:21 PM Subject: MBO Partners / Randall Thacker
Hello Randall, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTE4MjEtMjQ0OS0wLTEyMjctcHJvZC00NTcmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTAmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD00NTcmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTkwMTc5OTEmZW1haWxpZD1yYW5kc3QyN0B5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPTQ5OTQzJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67IZKXonjHpfsX84uUpWrHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards, Sara ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
